~Tutorial (PC Edition)~

This is the Recollection Room. By examining the central
calendar-style panel, you can find out in detail what
happened to the heroine. If you want to return to the room,
please touch the panel in the upper left corner.

Congratulations on clearing the game. As a clear bonus, the
following features have been unlocked: \c[10]Recollection
Full Unlock Switch\c[0], \c[10]Redo Switch\c[0].

The Full Unlock Switch allows you to view all recollection
scenes. The Redo Switch allows you to restart the game from
the beginning while carrying over your current recollection
progress. Please feel free to use both features as you like.

We recommend saving your data at the ending for recollection
purposes. Please continue to enjoy the game.
